comments: Possibly the worst teacher I\'ve had my entire college career. He\'s arrogant, self-prophesizing, and full of it. If you have the choice to take one of his classes... DON\'T. It\'s not worth your time.
This class is easy except for the VAGUE class project. this professor is a total blow hard. first day of class he proclaims to be the best engineer we will ever meet.

Lectures are 2 hours of chewin fat, so to speak. Topics are overly general. HW is easy, just busy work to BS a page or two of writing. Required for CEs, unfortunately. Capstone project quality was poor for our class, but depends on year.
This class is required, but not worth your time. Just show up and you will get an A.
